website_summaries.verdict: Recyclable, long, and sturdy – though other brands have more bags for the price, few can compete with Pogi's quality.
pros: Long bags (13.5") with a fresh powder scent
EPI plastic construction – strong and recyclable
Users like the thickness of the material that prevents leaks and the openings that are easy to access
cons: They have cardboard cores, but they are recyclable
A bit pricey, and there are fewer bags per pack (450) than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Really leak proof bags
customer_reviews.text: For years now I have been using another brand of bio-degradable bags (Earth Rated PoopBags), which I always ordered in bulk. When I went to re-oder them, I found these, and decided to give them a try. I can't say enough about them. They seem to feel a little bigger & a little thicker, and I am glad I took the chance to make the change. They also tear from the roll very easily & open easily also. So I am a happy pooper-picker-upper. I will probably reorder these when I run out next time.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B. Ward

customer_reviews.title: These are probably the best bags I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than the generic blue/black/purple bags on Amazon, but it was a conscious decision to be a little bit more earth friendly. These are probably the best bags I've used so far. They feel a little thicker than Earth Rated (for some reason, I feel like the smell penetrates through the Earth Rated bags). Also, the Pogi bags feel like hey are a "matte" finish so are a lot easier to open than the generic brands. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: duffer

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT biodegradable or earth-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are treated with EPI which is a chemical that breaks down the plastic quickly, but breaks it down into tiny pieces of, you guessed it, PLASTIC! The use of this chemical should be banned! (Not to mention it's use as earth-friendly!) I was very disappointed to learn that my attempt to use biodegradable bags instead of plastic was for naught. I will be researching to find truly biodegradable, earth-friendly bags for future use!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: These are made of plastic with an additive to speed up breakdown - not very earth-friendly
customer_reviews.text: The "earth-friendly" description is misleading. It makes you think these are compostable and are made of something other than plastic. Actually, they are just plastic with an additive that is supposed to make the plastic break down more quickly than ordinary plastic. It's not even clear that the additive works. And in any case, the bags are still plastic, and they will just break down into plastic microparticles. Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be anyone who makes true compostable/non-plastic poop bags, so these are maybe the best you can do unless you want to use wax paper and plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Used to be thick but now pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple years ago and LOVED them. They were thick and I could tackle the larges sloppiest poos and even use one bag to collect poo in the backyard as a glove. Bags were that strong. Just reordered and now they’re way thinner. :( I’m sad and disappointed. Nothing sucks more than poo on your hands while walking. This hasn’t happened yet but I feel like I’ll need to double bag these. Go back to the original manufacturing method please.
customer_reviews.author: JRod42

customer_reviews.title: Environment considered
customer_reviews.text: I own a home business in which I upcycle puncture bike inner tubes into dog leashes, collars and pet bag dispensers. In choosing a bag to include, I knew I wanted to continue with the idea of being environmentally friendly. After some research, I decided to go with Pogi both for the quality, quantity and price. So far my business- Tubular Gear- has only used Pogi bags. The cute pup on the bags displays perfectly through the hole in the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: E. McGann

customer_reviews.title: I dunno, they just work
customer_reviews.text: The eco-friendly is really the seller here, and it feels good to avoid putting more 1000-year plastic into the world just to clean up dog poo. No big complaints, but two 'would be nice if...' - I wish they came in rolls without a center cardboard piece to further minimize waste - The new roll sticker can sometimes tear the first bag. Switching to a less adhesive variety might make the product even more efficient. At the end though, these are quality bags that are less harmful for the environment without sacrificing anything in particular from the more toxic version.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Something changed?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these in the past, switched to another brand but then came back to Pogi, did your bags get thinner? They tear now at the seam which, as you can imagine, makes it very unpleasant when in the middle of picking it up. Have to double bag them now which I never had to do before. If you asked me last year I’d say they are great but something changed in the quality of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got these because of the reviews saying the scent was great and was easy to open. Well, one out of two aint bad. I LOVE the scent, smells great. Problem is, I find them extremely difficult to open. I thought that maybe, it was just the first bag, so I tried another. NOPE still cant open them. Correction, I can get them open but have to fight with them forever. And if your dog is like mine, once she does her thing, you got 5 seconds to pick it up, before she wants to take off. I gave them 5 stars on everything, but a 3 overall just cuz of the difficulty of opening them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: A reliable necessity
customer_reviews.text: They're poo bags, what can I say? I do like the light scent, which is just enough to help cover up less desireable odors without being overwhelmed. It also tells you which side the bag opens on, which is helpful for cold mornings when I'm trying to pick up without taking off my gloves. I appreciate that they don't send me a new holder in each box. My old brand did this and I didn't like the style, so I never used it- felt it was wasteful. This is one of those things that is best achieved with no fuss and that I prefer not to think about - and I definitely don't with these on subscription.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: OK - I know - who contacts customer service over poop bags? I've been buying these bags for years and I really like them. They are thick and sturdy and have a pleasant scent. Recently, I received a set of bags that was thinner than usual. I contacted customer service to ask if there had been a change They replied right away, apologized, and sent me a new box of perfect bags. They explained that there was no change, I just somehow got a weird batch. I was super impressed with such good service over something as mundane as poop bags!
customer_reviews.author: Pogodog

customer_reviews.title: Best Bags On Market!
customer_reviews.text: Best litter bags out there! I love my cat Joe, but not his litter box! These bags are wonderful! Not only are they earth friendly, they have a pleasant smell, helping if you scoop up cat poop and put it in this baggie. The baggie, helps keep the bathroom smelling good, and sealed away in the baggie, the cat poop smell is gone! Yay Also, we use these bags to clean up all of our dog waste from our 2 dogs in the backyard. They are extremely durable and can hold quite a bit, when scooping it all up. We have ordered these quite a few times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey S

customer_reviews.title: The One and Only
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Pogi poop bags for the better part of six years, and we love the bags. They do not disintegrate, the seams are sealed, and you do not feel like a warm fecal sample is directly on your hands. Buy the scent-free bags, the fragranced bags are a reminder of my grandmother's perfume.
customer_reviews.author: The Hulls

customer_reviews.title: Mor pickup, less smell.
customer_reviews.text: Imagine a bio-friendly, plastic glove that you wear to scoop the poop and do it while smelling baby powder. Pogi certainly delivers on their product details. I'm into my second of 20+ rolls and I have no complaints. My primary concern, when buying this product, was if it would break down in the environment. Of course bags are going to rip (what bag doesn't). I haven't had that problem, or seam tearing. All of the bags I've used so far perform exactly like any plastic bag... but I can do my small part to eliminate more plastic in the environment by using these.
customer_reviews.author: AWH

customer_reviews.title: On Subscribe and Save - great value
customer_reviews.text: I have these bags on Subscribe and Save. They are strong, and do what I need them to do. Being lightly scented wasn’t something I thought I needed, but it certainly helps if I have to carry the bag for a long distance before I find a bin. These are great bags, I buy them in bulk every few months to make sure I have plenty on hand. Oh, they go through the wash well and still work! Not recommending it, but they hold up and still do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Dallasb28

customer_reviews.title: Bags are thinner than previously
customer_reviews.text: This is my second batch. The bags are thinner than they used to be. Previous batch was unscented and had very little problem with smell. This new batch is scented and can’t even keep a roll in my pocket it’s so overwhelming. And it doesn’t help much with smell. The thicker bag was better.
customer_reviews.author: Red Dobe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poo bags
customer_reviews.text: I debated on 4 stars or 5 simply because 5 stars saying "I love it" about Poop bags felt pretty strange but the truth is these are great bags for the job. Many bags are very thin and these are not. These are thick enough, big enough and have a pleasant smell enough to cover up the unpleasant one inside of it. I purchase these regularly and it has become the only bag I use. The best part is they're biodegradable, which is an absolute necessity to me. Plastic literally stays forever and between my two dogs I use a minimum of 4 bags a day, so that adds up pretty quickly. I will spare the photo for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! The perfume make a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing!!! I love them we have Saint Bernard and his business are no Joke!!! The bags are big enough to take care of the that and the smell makes a huge difference at the time of disposal. I just want to know if we can please a PO and send checks for bigger other for my HOA. I want to use them all over the community. Unfortunatly we cannot do credit or debit card transaction in our HOA. Please contact me back on this.
customer_reviews.author: MrVascony

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Not what I needed though.
customer_reviews.text: Bags are great! —sturdy, easy to open. Love the dispensing box. The scent was a little too strong for me. The problem is that I have 3 dogs, one an 85lb German Shepherd. I clean up the yard with a pooper scooper. I bought these because they were advertised as extra large. They are bigger than the usual, however, not big enough to use with big poops and a pooper scooper. They would be great for single use as in walks, but didn’t work for yard cleanup. It’s OK as I can still use them for walks. Ordered what I had been using—composite bags, which work well. Otherwise good product, nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Watson

customer_reviews.title: Unscented is false. The unscented do have a scent. Made me immediately sick.
customer_reviews.text: I have an extreme sensitivity to some artificial fragrances. The "unscented" might not have a specific scent, but it definitely has an artificial fragrance applied to it. Upon opening the package, I immediately became nauseous and developed a headache. * Plus, the box was shipped in an envelope and was subsequently crushed. * These are not earth friendly, just the box is made from recycled materials. * Also, was not allowed to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne & Shiraz Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I found these Pogi's bags
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of purchasing our last batch of bags through some company on ebay, and they bag quality was AWFUL. The bags were so thin and cheap. They would constantly tear, have holes, etc. I am so glad I found these Pogi's bags. They smell good *as good as bags can smell?haha* and I like that they are earth friendly. They were easy to tear and none of them so far have torn apart or had holes. Plus 30 rolls for under $17? Can't beat it. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PittieMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bags are more earth-friendly than the usual poop bags. They have a nice fresh/powdery scent that's strong enough to block out most of the poo smell when you're mid-cleanup and once the bag is tied, I can't smell anything except the fresh scent. They feel sturdy and thicker than some of the cheap poop bags. And they're cute - obviously not a requirement for a poop bag, but a bonus. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: which I really like! The design on the bags is also cute
customer_reviews.text: These bags are strong and more environmentally friendly than the traditional plastic ones, which I really like! The design on the bags is also cute, which I enjoy. The powder smell, though, I dislike. I have also found that they are difficult to tear and open. Another thing I did not take into consideration was that each roll only has 15 bags on it! If I was smart and did the math before purchasing, I would have known that each roll would not last nearly as long as I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these bags and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is our second round with Pogi bags and we are VERY happy with them! I've had no issues getting the bags opened like I read on other reviews. If you try to open it where the company has marked open on the bag, they open right up. We used our entire box and haven't had one issue at all. They are easy to tie, regardless of no handles. We have a big 100lb dog and I have no problem picking up or tying the bag closed. The smell is powdery and soft. I don't find it overwhelming at all. It sure smells better than whats in the bag! Highly recommend these bags! We will definitely be back for more
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap scented poo bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were cheap and scented. The earth rated aspect was attractive however I learned that anything that goes to my local dump does not really get the chance to degrade and re-enter the earth for at least a few thousand years haha (my dump is made to contain trash for a very long time so it doesn't get into the soil or groundwater which is the most common type of dump), so that aspect doesn't really matter in my case (check with your local sanitation department to see how your trash is dumped). I haven't had one break yet and I like the scented aspect of them. Great poo bags for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Yerkes

customer_reviews.title: Still not unscented
customer_reviews.text: These hold up well, but I'm s so disappointed that they are not truly unscented. That was the only reason i purchased such a large quantity. Now I'm stuck with bags that i can't stand the smell. Its me... I'm very sensitive but i actually gag at times. Very unpleasant for me each and every day. On the plus side though, I've not had a bag break yet and i like the fact that they are biodegradable.
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Not as user friendly as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are not consistently good quality. The first 2 boxes last year were fine, now the current box I bought, I can't get the bags to open easily. I have now gone through 6 rolls in the new box, and they are all the same. I cant' get the darn bags to open. too hard to use if the bag won't open easily, .... normally i just rub my fingers over the opening side, and the bag slides right open. these i find myself fighting with the bag to get the sides to separate from each other and open.
customer_reviews.author: JeninFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, but the rolls are too fat
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags, very roomy and with a good amount of fragrance. My only problem with them is that the rolls do not fit in the little poop-bag container velcroed to our dog's leash--they are too fat. The container is bone-shaped and is specifically meant to hold one roll of poop bags. We got it free with another brand, and it worked great with that brand's rolls. With Pogi's bags, I have to unroll 3 or 4 bags off of the roll before the roll is slim enough to fit into the container. Not a deal-breaker because I can always stash the extra bags in my pocket, but just thought I'd point it out.
customer_reviews.author: Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Buy these bags! Best everything.
customer_reviews.text: Love this company! Durable, affordable, earth friendly dog bags. I like how they printed which side to open, that’s helpful. But what I love most is their customer service. I accidentally ordered the wrong bags (scented, when I wanted unscented). It was totally my fault, but they were so generous they sent me a new box and told me to just donate the bags to dogs in need instead of returning them. And the replacement showed up quickly. Thank you. This was my first purchase of Pogjs, I would definitely purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eriKa

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you are buying unscented and they are great
customer_reviews.text: The unscented ones are just about perfect. I'm taking away a star because I unknowingly bought scented ones which are worse in every way and, as far as I can tell, have no reason to exist. They are SIGNIFICANTLY harder to open, and the "scent" is too weak to do anything other than linger in your pockets or whatever you store them in, it does nothing to cover up the scent of actual dog poop. I understand it was my mistake ordering scented in the first place but I certainly wouldn't have expected them to be so much worse than the normal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Leonard

customer_reviews.title: A good earth friendly poop bag
customer_reviews.text: You need to pick up your dogs poop on a walk, so you need a bag. You don't want to contribute to the plastic problem. So I feel these are a good solution. We have used 3 boxes so far. They are easy to use. No scent. We have not had one tear yet. We have a big golden, so as you can imagine capacity has been put to the test at times. These have stood up to the task every time.
customer_reviews.author: Beci

customer_reviews.title: For Cats Too!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a dog, but I do have a pride of cats. I scoop their litter box twice a day and fill up two of these bags. They are strong and sturdy, and once I've filled them with clumped cat litter and waste, I give them a quick twist and dump them in the trash. There is no issue with odor and I've never had one tear or leak. Not at all what they were designed for but they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Overperforming bags!
customer_reviews.text: First - Biodegradable is a must! Second - the cost is great Third - the scent comes in handy :-j Fourth - they are dependable and do not tear easily as one might think biodegradable might Fifth - you can never say they underperform, as Amazon workers are told when attempting to meet impossible packing & shipping rates :-f
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Swise

customer_reviews.title: The Pooper Picker-Upper
customer_reviews.text: I started using these bags about 6 months ago. Love the fact that they breakdown and leave less waste in the environment. Added bonus: these bags are printed with a design that very clearly shows which end is "up". Takes the guess work out of trying to figure out which end is not sealed. Very convenient and makes the whole process a lot more efficient... especially if you're in bad whether or have your hands full keeping fido under control. The scented bags smell pretty nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Bass

customer_reviews.title: Poop Patrol Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: I have used them only a few times to pick up my dog's poop.. The bags are the perfect size and work perfectly for the intended purpose. I did use the plastic bags from my daily newspapers, but since I no longer receive the paper, I needed an alternate source. Pogi's Poop Bags was an excellent replacement. The small rolls that contain so many bags takes up so little space and are strong enough to not tear when using them. I purchased the 30 roll box (450 bags). which should last me over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D. Goin

customer_reviews.title: Really a great product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe that you could love a poop bag but these things really are awesome. They are sturdy, come off the roll easily, and smell great. The mild fragrance of lavender is nice when you’re about to pick up your dog’s smelly poop. The other great thing about them is that I’m not struggling to figure out which side of the bag to open as it is clearly marked.. You don’t want to be fiddling with the bag when you’re trying to complete the chore and with these bags that’s not an issue. Lastly, I am very eco-conscious and these bags are biodegradable. This is really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Pogi's are the top of their class
customer_reviews.text: We use Pogi's poop bags exclusively. We have 4 dogs that go on 2 hikes a day and run around in the yard so we are constantly picking up poop. These bags are easy to use, very sturdy and do not puncture easily, have a fresh scent and a dry tactile quality that makes them easy to open and tie closed. They are also environmentally friendly which is a big plus for us. I recommend Pogi's to everyone with a dog or a pet you have to pick up after.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After using these bags for a few weeks, it is obvious that the manufacturer put some real thought into the design. My dog is about fifty pounds. The bags have plenty of room. I especially like that they are long enough to twirl and tie. The perforations separate easily. They even have a note on each bag stating which end opens. I also like that they fit in my existing bag holder without a rod. My goal was to reduce the environmental impact of all the bags we use. I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: JWallin

customer_reviews.title: great for litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use when I scoop the two jumbo litter boxes I have for my 3 cats. They work great for that. The bags are durable, easy to open, and although I don't think the "powder fresh" scent smells like powder, the scent is strong enough to help minimize the poop smell in my outdoor garbage bin. I'm not wild about the sticker holding the roll closed on the first bag but it's a minor annoyance. I cannot attest to them being leak-proof as I use a clumping cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenician Insomniac

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great bags for my two mini-schnoodles. Been using their bags for over a year & haven't had any bad bags that I can recall (unlike the cheap bags that were frequently splitting open at the seams. The scent on these is like baby powder, so picking up poo with these reminds one a bit of changing diapers, but that's an improvement over no scent, I think. Looks like they increased size since my last order: 8.5"x12.5" before to 9"x13.5" for this order. That's not a problem for me, just an observation--they still fit my existing bag holders fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to separate bags
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags for several years and generally been happy with them. However the last batch of bags I ordered have been MUCH more difficult to separate / tear apart the bags from one another. It is more than one roll in the box, and clearly different from past orders - I had a couple of rolls from a previous order in the car and when I retrieved those, separating the bags in those rolls was no big deal. These latest rolls are so difficult as to cause pain in my elbow and wrist in trying to separate them, I don't know if they've changed the manufacturing process or this is simply an aberrant batch.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sound important, but they indicate on each bag which is the side to open. Some other brands you have to guess, so I like that feature. Otherwise they are just fine...strong, large and soft enough to put in my pocket and not have a crinkling sound. Also they are unscented! Be careful when you order that you don't get the scented ones.
customer_reviews.author: The Gaber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find perforation and to open - sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all different kind of bags for my 111lb doggy. These are the best I've found because: I can find the perforation in the dark to rip off the next bag with ease They are sturdy They are easy to open The 1st sticker does not rip the 1st bag in each roll apart The price is good for the quality I've yet to have a bag rip (used about 4 rolls so far)
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: These are the bags we like, all but the price. Sturdy, good perforation, ready to open for use. The scent isn't our favorite, but all least it's not vanilla or someone equally as wretch worthy. Lavender, lemon, ocean breeze would be far better. Not sure if they come in other scents.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, especially for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these bags for years with a golden retriever and a flat-coated retriever, both rescues. They dispense easily, they are incredibly sturdy and do not have a scent which makes me queasy. The only issue I have every now and again is trouble separating one bag from another without causing a tear, making the bag unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in a poop bag. I have a 90 pound dog so a strong poop bag is a must. These bags are strong and keep the yucky smells. That is important because my dog always poops at the beginning of the day, and the hotter the day the bigger her poops. I'd buy these again and again. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: M Always Reading Something

customer_reviews.title: Will buy these again, after I eventually run out.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. They're not too thin that you have to worry about poking a finger through. They fit in the regular dispenser that I already had. I like the box/dispenser for the rolls - keeps my cupboard better organized. They have a hint of smell to them, kind of a baby powder scent - while it doesn't over power most dog poo, it certainly helps a little. They are also large enough that I can pick up two piles of mastiff poo in one bag. So, whatever kind of dog you have - they will certainly be big enough for you ;-)
customer_reviews.author: terrapinie

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL REASON? CATS and MOTHER NATURE.
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags actually for my cat litter box clean up. These are larger than most - make sure if you buy them you get the "XL" so when you scoop cat stuff then your scooper fits into the top of the bag. Look, the REAL reason why I got these is because they are biodegradable and the plastic we are shoving down Mother Nature's throat is not cutting off circulation and not good for anybody, me, you, pets. So, great answer. If they made these even a bit larger that would be cool, but this is a GREAT answer to a really growing problem.
customer_reviews.author: kamline

customer_reviews.title: These smell TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 3 stars because these bags function as they should. They do not tear easily and there are no surprise holes in them. That said, the scented version is vile. And combined with the scent of poo? Even worse. We have been working out way through them for months with no end in sight. I don't want to be wasteful but I think I've reached my limit with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to open, and covers the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love these poop bags, which is a strange sentence--but I really do. They're super easy to get open--a major consideration for me, as I have arthritis--and the very mild, pleasant talcum powder scent (once bag is opened) completely covers any less pleasant scent emanating from the bag's contents. Not sure how they managed that, but I'm grateful--it makes the remainder of the walk so much more pleasant. The price seems really reasonable for a bag which, in addition to the points already mentioned, is sturdy, roomy, and earth-friendly. I'm going to recommend these to all the dog-owners on our street, and to our friends--it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Library girl

customer_reviews.title: OK bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags are generally good. They're strong, the right size, and I've never encountered a hole in one. However: - They're difficult to open unless your fingers are wet. Dog drool works for me. - The scented bags reek. In all truthfulness, dog poop doesn't smell as strongly. I intended to purchase unscented bags, but the products are poorly differentiated on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Long

customer_reviews.title: Whether kids or dogs, you need these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these poop bags. I use them for my kids' poop diapers so that the smell is mostly contained until their garbage cans are actually full, and I feel a lot better knowing that the bags themselves will biodegrade much more quickly than the other bags I used to use. The diaper inside is still a worry of mine (as far as biodegrading), but at least the bag that contains it will return to mother earth ASAP. They have a scented powder which does give me a little bit of concern, but I just try to open them carefully and without much movement/shaking to reduce how much of the scented powder gets kicked up into the air.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My gold standard for comparison is the Earth Rated poop ...
customer_reviews.text: My gold standard for comparison is the Earth Rated poop bag. These are comparable quality. The scent is less strong (meaning it doesn't mask as much), but the bags are easier to separate (perforations are bigger) and the label that holds a roll closed is easier to tear open. If you're considering buying this box, note that Earth Rated includes holders that clip on the leash, but Pogi's does not (at least, not in this box). This is not a problem as long as you have a holder, but if you don't, you should buy one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Dean L. Surkin

customer_reviews.title: Eco-Friendly and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that these are biodegradable bags! There are so many bags in a box that it takes me a while to go through them all, so I consider this a great value. The bags are thick enough to not feel like you're actually touching the poop, but this is pretty standard. (I *have*, however, had one brand of bags that was so thin that I felt like I had to immediately wash my hands afterward.) Even the box on this is eco-friendly--love it!
customer_reviews.author: Commander Ducky

customer_reviews.title: We love Pogi's Poop Bags!! Biodegradable, Good for the Environment, Happy Pet Owners
customer_reviews.text: Good for the environment (biodegradeable), work just as well, if not better than, most dog waste bags. This carton has a perforated corner so that when you open the box it becomes a dispenser. We really like these bags, are glad they are environmentally friendly, and this large package lasts a long time. This is our second package of these that we have purchased. We use them for one dog (pit bull) about twice per day and the 1 pack lasted about 4-5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if these are disintegrating or biodegrading into the earth as I'm not at the trash dump, but it feels good in my mind to use them. wish they had handles for tying. small sized for using with larger cat deposits or multiple scooping. then again, it's made for dog doo.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rauk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I pick up a lot of doggie poo. Between making sure to get it out of the yard asap, and hiking, I can go through bags fairly quickly. I HATED using plastic bags that I knew wouldn't degrade. I was very happy to find these. This is the third box I have purchased, and will continue to use these as long as they are sold!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and crazy convenient
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to carry poop bags in the plastic carrier that came in the first box of these that I bought. It's also great that the rolls are small, even when not stored in the carrier, they don't take up much room in suitcases, purses, etc., so I can have poop bags and extra poop bags with me at all times. I have also never had any problems with holes in these bags; they are well made and stand up fairly well, even when extra debris is collected along with the poop. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bag with no smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Sturdy, easy to open. Easy to separate from the roll without ripping the bag. You know, the important things when you're out there doing the walking business. No problems at all. Tried the corn starch bags for ecological reasons and they ripped apart so easily, deteriorated fast, too fast! These are a much better option, and no stinky scent. Good choice. We'll buy again and again, I'm sure. Be sure to specify unscented. The last order I placed came with scented bags in the unscented marked packaging. Customer service was terrific in replacing. Sent twice the order! Great company. Great bags.
customer_reviews.author: jislove

customer_reviews.title: Nice poop bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a golden retriever and needed some poop bags that are thick and durable but easy to open. In my opinion these bags open easier than any other bags I have used and are printed where you are supposed to open so you don't have to get lucky and guess what side is correct. These bags do seem to kill the odor nicely with the scent they have but are not overpowering. The bags are plenty large enough for a large breed dog like we have. I was originally using another brand dispenser bought at Wal-mart and they fit in it perfectly. I have recently replaced that dispenser with the Pogi one because it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good "green" option
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about poop bags? Never had one break on me I suppose. Not like the scented ones ever fooled anyone, so mine are unscented I think, and they are compostable. I'm half-way through my second box of rolls and half-way through a "stationary" version of the same (one big roll). Dependable medium size bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The highest qualtiy in dog poop bags available
customer_reviews.text: Soooo, this is going to sound really weird since I'm talking about bags to pick up poop, buuuut these are definitely the highest quality dog poop bags I have come across...and I have used several different brands. They are reasonably priced, as well. Unfortunately, I recently bought 900+ bags of a competing poop bag brand. I thought I was getting a bargain, because hey, it's just to pick up dog poop, right?!? Well, turns out there is a significant difference in dog poop bags. Rest assured - in (about) 850 more poops I will DEFINITELY be switching back to Pogi's! MARK MY WORDS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: these bags have been great. I have used them for the past several ...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these bags have been great. I have used them for the past several months. Today, I opened a new roll and noticed that the first bag was not sealed...luckily I noticed it before it was too late! Just examine the bag, before you blindly "dive-in".
customer_reviews.author: LGN

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, well marked which side to open (which when you are walking 3 dogs at night is important,) and I am actually surprised that I like the scent. I thought it seemed a little silly to have scented poop bags, but I throw them in one container over the week and then bag that and add it to my trash, (per city regs) and that's when I appreciate it. The process is a little less gross. I like these, good size and work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: dawnhighhouse

customer_reviews.title: I really love the idea that these are biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: I really love the idea that these are biodegradable. I had ordered some bags before and I love those. I thought these were the same ones but they don't have the handles and are a bit smaller than the ones I ordered before so I don't like them quite as much. Of course now I have 450 bags to go through before getting the ones I like! Ha ha!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags because they relatively easy to dispense, and have a marking on the side where the bag can be opened. I found this feature quite convenient. Just like other bags I had they don’t insulate the smell very well, so I still double bag. Otherwise I’m happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a lot better than using the grocery store bags and hoping they ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why everyone doesn't use these. Very convenient. Hell of a lot better than using the grocery store bags and hoping they don't have a hole. Took off a star because it can be tricky to find the perforation between bags and they should have thought of making a mark on the bag for it.
customer_reviews.author: Entropy21

customer_reviews.title: Used to clean kitty box, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these when cleaning out the kitty box. It helps control the odor until garbage day, and I use about 1 bag/day. I have one female cat and anyone with a female cat knows that distinct urine smell... No more! I can leave used bags tied off in my uncovered bathroom waste bin for the whole week and all you will smell is the soft lavender. Nice to have over a year supply in one order!
customer_reviews.author: Raquelly

customer_reviews.title: It works both for me and my dog!
customer_reviews.text: After using these bags for almost a year (1 box), I can't really find fault with anything about this product. Never had an issue with even one bag, and I do like the smell and that it's eco-friendly. Considered other options when it came time to re-order, but in the end, couldn't justify making a change.
customer_reviews.author: MGDan

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great smelling little poop bags for my little Shih Tzu. I will say the perforation is a little hard to find sometimes especially when I’m in a hurry if I could comment on that I would say I would make the perforation mark a bit more pronounced
customer_reviews.author: Moonchild

customer_reviews.title: The perfect poop bags!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bags. Super durable, a great size, easy to open, and easy to tie closed. The smell is strong enough to cover the poop smell which is good but is kind of overwhelming, which is my only criticism. Have used other bags that are flimsy or hard to open. Once I found these I haven't used any other bags!
customer_reviews.author: CacoethesScribendi

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these bags.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of those things that you can attach to your leash to carry poop bags and it came with these bags. Once I ran out I had to get more! Not because of size or anything but because I love them! They are scented and just enough to cover any poop smell! They came in a timely manner and the container is super easy to refill. Will definitely be keeping stocked with these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product.....
customer_reviews.text: Big deal "Recyclable - Our cardboard cores and packaging are made with recyclable materials." NOT MADE FROM RECYCLED MATERIAL, BUT SOMETHING YOU CAN RECYCLE. Cardboard cores and packaging are made from recyclable materials. BUT NOT THE POOP BAGS - I THOUGHT THEY WERE MADE FROM RECYCLED PLASTIC. WON'T BUY AGAIN....
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: good bags
customer_reviews.text: Just started using these bags, they are a nice size, wish they were a tad wider, but over all they are bigger then most. They have a good powder scent, which is needed. Some bags say scented and they are not (my previous purchase). If you put these in your pocket, your pocket will smell powdery fresh. I use them for daily scooping of litter boxes, so that isn't a problem for me. So far so good, well scented, strong enough and I like the biodegradable factor.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. They are easy to open which is big time important, especially because as soon as the dog is done doing his business, he is ready to move on!!! I bought the other biodegradable bags first and I would struggle with some of them to get them open. These have a powder scent which is not too overpowering and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Decent bags, hard to open though
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fine in the sense that they are durable and they fit into other dispensers. There's only a few things I need out of doggie bags and these don't have those features. They are difficult to open, which is a huge problem in the winter. I don't like having to take my gloves off in the freezing cold. They also don't have a clear indicator of where the perforation is between bags within the roll...so it is sometimes tricky in the dark to see if you are tearing it at the right spot. Overall they are okay though and I do like the green as opposed to black.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags as much as one can love a bag for poop! They are big enough (we have a GSD) and are marked on which side to open. They separate easily from the roll without ripping and the last bag on the roll is as good as the first. I keep reordering these. I wish they could manufacturer them without the cardboard center, but at least that will also disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: These bags are like the bags they sell at the dollar store They also are defective because the sides rip when opening them. Unfortunately it has been over 30 days and amazon will not return them. I just open the box and started using them
customer_reviews.author: Shopper girl74

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in poop baggied
customer_reviews.text: These poop bags are excellent! I put them in a training bag and they dispense easily. They are sturdy, I haven't had one rip yet. If your dog gets ahold of it anrld really chews them it probably would rip. The scent is very nice for counteracting the dog poo smell.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Biodegradable? Yes! Easy tear from the roll? Yes! Substantial enough that you don’t feel the smell is leaking onto your hands? Yes! My husband bought cheaper bags but they were not worth the irritation. I bought Pogi's again. They are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Hold poop with poise and confidence. Feel great about it!
customer_reviews.text: Look at how civilized we have become. We clean up after our dogs while our own bathrooms grow increasingly filthy. But I digress. This pack of 30 rolls is priced at an excellent value, and the bags are sturdy/thick enough that I feel comfortable using a single pack to handle my pitbull's steaming mounds of bio-truffles. The green color is also nice - it almost makes me feel like I'm recycling when I throw the bags into my neighbor's garbage bin. Definitely would recommend and will likely reorder from this same vendor when all 30 rolls run out. I will update this review when that happens just in case my experience changes between roll 4 and roll 29.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good poop bags
customer_reviews.text: The only real compliant I have is that they can be hard to open when you have leash (attached to an overly enthusiastic 100 pound Labrador) in one hand and the poop bag in the other, the open end tends to stick together and/or still have some plastic perforations holding it closed. But that's a problem that pretty much every poop bag I've ever used has . The bags are scented, which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest E Hodge

customer_reviews.title: What a sweet deal! You can really get ripped off with ...
customer_reviews.text: What a sweet deal! You can really get ripped off with these poo bags if you're not careful. This was a great investment for our 40 lb Australian Shepherd & hound mix. The size is just right for getting poops on walks. I've also used it to clear up the whole yard into a larger bag. They tear apart easily and open easily for the most part (except for those cold and dark nights!). Initially I would just tie them onto the leash, but after forgetting them, or the rare case of a two poop walk, I got a small green container to hold the roll. What else can you say about a poop bag? Good stuff, biodegradable also!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G

customer_reviews.title: never break and not too hard to open.Best bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I NEVER havew3 to worry about having poop on my hands from a bag splitting open ,etc...It just NEVER happens.The bags do require you wetting you're fingers a few times to bet the open but they're clearly marked for where the top and bottom are so you know you're opening the right end.Best Bags ever.
customer_reviews.author: brent b

customer_reviews.title: A poop bag is a poop bag is a poop bag
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of [you could say slightly unnecessary] research on doggie poop bags, and was nervous because there were reviews that the bags would break when used with larger poops. I purchased this anyways since it was unscented and came in a large quantity, and the poop bags are great. I have a 75 pound dog with relatively large and dense poops, and the bags work just like you'd want a good poop bag to work. A poop bag is a poop bag so don't think too far into it. These work great!
customer_reviews.author: Emiko

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended -- strong bags for large heaps
customer_reviews.text: After having used these bags for about two weeks, I am pleasantly surprised. Although I first they seemed slightly flimsier than my previous no-brand blue plastic bags, they've held up surprisingly well to (sometimes rather large) mounds of dog dung. The smell (of the bags, not dog dung) is pretty strong at first, but fade over time. This is a good thing since it can be a bit overpowering, especially at first once you open the package will all 30 rolls throwing their talcum powder smell at you. Overall, I would recommend these -- the bags stand up well, are larger than the average bag, and have not once leaked in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AEO

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: These bags are exactly what I was expecting. They come in a nice box that is easily stored with a little door for getting the rolls out. 30 rolls per box should last me a while. They are scented, which is making my garage also scented, but that's not a bad thing. They tear easily and are spacious enough for using a single bag with 2 big dogs on a walk. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky42

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, sturdy, and great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great poop bags. They are thick enough to not fall apart, but aren’t too thick. The perforations between bags actually work. The size of the bags are big enough for extra large poops. The bags are marked which end opens. These bags open well, without much fuss or having to wet your fingers first. I got the unscented bags. And you get a lot of bags for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags! I like that they are Earth-friendly, but am also very impressed with their sturdiness and volume (we have a large dog). They also have a pleasant scent that is not overpowering or sneeze-eliciting like some others we've tried. They also fit nicely into the standard-sized leash attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: ... too much to review as poop bags are all pretty similar. The are thick enough
customer_reviews.text: There isn't too much to review as poop bags are all pretty similar. The are thick enough. You can check the dimensions, but for being a "large" bag, I don't think I would want to use them with a large dog. I would go for the extra large. These work great for my dachshunds though. I also feel good about spending slightly more on "eco-friendly" bag, not that I could test their eco-friendliness. Also, there are scented, but I don't really notice the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the poop smelling fresh as a daisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of poop bags. They're lightly scented (which is nice) and they're very solid. They separate easily (as they should) and we haven't had a single issue with a ripped/punctured bag (even though our dog seems to love pooping on pine straw). Good size; high-quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags work well and smell pretty nice. The scent isn't very strong but it does mask some of the poop smell. I have bit of trouble dispensing the bags on a new roll, but not enough to not like them. You get a lot of bags at a great price so I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Just like not using a bag!
customer_reviews.text: I think these bags must degrade over time in the cupboard. I just picked up poop and the bag instantly split. This is about the 10th time I have got dog poop over my hand. Not the best way to start the dog walk.
customer_reviews.author: sm blonde

customer_reviews.title: So convenient, so perfect for an distasteful task
customer_reviews.text: The Pogi bags come on a convenient roll, perfectly sized for my hand. We've used maybe a thousand of these bags without a single problem. Easy to tear off from the roll, simple to open and ideal for the poop-picking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Not always easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great value. Cons: Sometimes bags are not easy to open. For me, easy to open is more important than value. I want this already unpleasant task to be quick and easy without "maybe" getting frustrated because I can't open the bag. I won't be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open, frustrating bags
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested that I get these. Unfortunately, I have found these bags incredibly difficult to open. I have two large dogs and can't seem to get the bags open without licking my fingers. Since inevitably, I will need to pick up at least 3-4 poops on a walk, I do not want to put my fingers anywhere near my mouth after I pick up a poop. I simply get frustrated and am honestly just waiting to use up the bags. Other reviews have found this no to be the case, so I guess its hit or miss, but I don't want to do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Bromfield

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as before, just average
customer_reviews.text: These bags have worked so well for us in the past We just bought our 3rd Box of them . And boy are we disappointed. They do not seem to be as thick as the ones we received before, The tear easy . End the scent is in Quaid as strong is before.
customer_reviews.author: cdewitte

customer_reviews.title: These are really good bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my neighbor who has a 65 lb dog. He said they are very sturdy and easy to use. He especially likes the scent when carrying them back to a garbage can. He also liked the fact they are biodegradeable.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Petronzio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bags in bulk
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Like other reviewers said, they're strong enough that there's no worry anything will break through and make a mess. I do wish the box had come with one of the little bag carrier bones, but that's alright. The only thing I wish were different about the bags themselves is the fresh powder scent could be a bit stronger. I previously used some that had a lemon scent that covered the smell better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My first poop bag review...and I can definitely recommend. Typically, we have purchased bags at local pet retail stores, but I was very pleased to see these cost significantly less. And we were buying quite a few rolls at a time and purchasing the least expensive ones. Given the different options at Amazon, I plan to purchase these again. I purchased the 'powder fresh scent' with 30 rolls of bags. Very lightly scented, but not an overbearing smell or any smell of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

product_meta.title: Pogi’s Poop Bags - Large, Leak-Proof, Earth-Friendly Poop Bags for Dogs
feature_bullets: Earth-Friendly Dog Poop Bags with EPI Technology (9 x 13.5 inches) - Our poop bags are made big enough for even the largest of dogs, and thick enough to ensure there are no messes.
Easy to Open - Smoothly detaches from roll and features a clearly marked opening side.
Fresh Powder Scented - The fresh powder scent helps to lock in nose-shattering odors.
Sustainable - Our cardboard cores and packaging are made from recycled materials.
Super Pack - 30 Rolls (450 Bags) - 6+ Month Supply - Rolls fit in all standard sized dispensers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
